comment: Informal survey : I am presenting at a Florida Bar next week . My materials are already prepared and submitted to the bar . I am now contemplating whether or not to do an accompanying . Do you find PowerPoints helpful during presentations ? Please share your thoughts .
amr:
# ::snt Informal survey : I am presenting at a Florida Bar next week . My materials are already prepared and submitted to the bar . I am now contemplating whether or not to do an accompanying . Do you find PowerPoints helpful during presentations ? Please share your thoughts .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / survey-01
            :mod (f / formal)
            :topic (p / present-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :location (b / bar
                        :mod (s2 / state
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Florida")))
                  :time (w / week
                        :mod (n2 / next))))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (p2 / prepare-01
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :ARG1 (m2 / material
                        :poss ii2)
                  :time (a2 / already))
            :op2 (s3 / submit-01
                  :ARG0 ii2
                  :ARG1 m2
                  :ARG2 b))
      :snt3 (c / contemplate-01
            :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
            :ARG1 (t / truth-value
                  :polarity-of (d / do-02
                        :ARG0 ii3
                        :ARG1 (a3 / accompany-01)))
            :time (n3 / now))
      :snt4 (f2 / find-02
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (h / helpful-04
                  :ARG0 (p3 / powerpoint)
                  :time (p4 / present-01))
            :polarity (a4 / amr-unknown))
      :snt5 (s4 / share-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                  :ARG1-of (t3 / think-01
                        :ARG0 y))))

comment: Thanks everyone . I appreciate your feedback . Based on the responses I ve decided to do a but to make it fun , short & not a repetition of the material which will already be in the book . I ve already started putting my slides together . I m actually having with it .
amr:

      :snt1 (t / thank-01
